lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "We must provide some form of interest rate buydown, principal reduction relief for all eligible farmers and ranchers regardless of their lending institution," Boren said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But Neil Harl, professor of economics at Iowa State University told the hearing the cost could be in the range of 3.5 billion dlrs annually.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The comments by Senators of both parties, plus endorsements for the across-the-board approach from the nation's largest farm organization, the American Farm Bureau Federation, and from the system itself, appeared to significantly broaden the focus of the rescue legislation for the farm credit system.
